text: Mark Goodspeed (December 1, 1956 – January 10, 1998) was an American football tackle. He played for the St. Louis Cardinals in 1980 and for the Birmingham Stallions in 1983. ==References== Category:1956 births Category:1998 deaths Category:American football tackles Category:Nebraska Cornhuskers football players Category:St. Louis Cardinals (football) players Category:Birmingham Stallions players
title: Mark Goodspeed
